title: Plat 5 Support main looking to join a team
body: Hello my IGN is DarianC96 i am a plat5 player who has been playing for about 3 years. I am a support main swapped from being a mid laner. I play everyday and i am very flexible when it comes to times for practice.

replies.body: Our team trains from 1am- 12:59am every day. Plat + requirement, you want in my man
Hey man my main is plat and this account ain't far from it and I would be so happy to duo with you and maybe we can reach that diamond V
